10 Stunning Luxury Resorts Near Delhi For A Weekend Getaway

Tripotohttps://www.tripoto.com/
By Gunjan Upreti
150.3k
VIEWS
48 Likes
Save
Share
Copy Link

Looking for luxury resorts near Delhi for a weekend getaway? Well! Thanks to its perfect geography, planning a quick weekend getaway from Delhi is never a taxing process. From Rajasthan to Himachal Pradesh, here are 10 best resorts near Delhi where snow, safari or history â€” everything is available just a few hours away from the capital.

You may also like to read: Delhi famous market, cheap places to visit in delhi, BYOB bars in Delhi NCR

Here Are 10 Gorgeous Resorts near Delhi for a Weekend Escape

1. Laxmi Vilas Palace, Bharatpur

The Laxmi Vilas Palace is situated in a beautiful location close to Keoladeo National Park, Bharatpur. In 1994, the palace was converted into a heritage hotel and has been operational ever since.

Distance From Delhi: 3 h 56 min (219.3 km) via Taj Express Highway

Book Here: Laxmi Vilas Palace

SPONSORED

2. Aalia, Haridwar

The luxury villas are on the banks of the Ganga and the hotel will organise a ride to watch the Ganga aarti at Haridwar. Alternatively, you can always pack in the family for a jeep safari to the Rajaji National Park.

Distance from Delhi: 5 h (220.8 km) via NH 58

Book Here: Aalia

SPONSORED

3. Ananta Spa & Resorts, Pushkar

A blissful combination of sublimate tranquility and great luxury, no wonder it is on our list of resorts near Delhi for a weekend getaway.

Distance from Delhi: 7 h 18 min (428.8 km) via NH 8

Book Here: Ananta Spa & Resorts

SPONSORED

4. Glenmoor Cottages, Mcleodganj

Martin Scorsese, Richard Gere, Paul Simon and the Duchess of York have stayed at the Glenmoor Cottages. And it happens to be one of the most popular resorts near Delhi for a weekend escape. The cottages sit in little private pockets, all of them overlooking the Dhauladhar range and the Kangra valley.

Distance from Delhi: 9 h 30 min (503.6 km) via NH 1

Book Here: Glenmoor Cottages

SPONSORED

5. Grand View Hotel, Dalhousie

Nestled in the Himalayas, Grand View Hotel is just five minutes away from the town centre. Itâ€™s a simple space, with an in-house restaurant, lavish buffets, garden party coffee shop and lovely views. This also is a popular choice among the travellers for resorts near Delhi for a weekend break.

Distance from Delhi: 9 h 46 min (558.9 km) via NH 1

Book Here: Grand View Hotel

SPONSORED

6. The Anantmaya Resort, Manali

Crisp mountain air, trekking, and stunning views = successful long weekend. So if you are looking for resorts near Delhi for a weekend break, look no further than the Anantmaya Resort in Manali.

Distance from Delhi: 11 h 28 min (535.9 km) via NH 1 and NH21

Book Here: The Anantmaya

SPONSORED

7. Neemrana Fort Palace

Neemrana Fort Palace is wonderful. It's a perfect romantic getaway and even if you aren't in the mood for romance it's still worth a visit with friends and family. A little less that two hours from Delhi makes it one of the top places that your must visit if you have just a day or two to spare.

Distance from Delhi: 2 h 56 min (115.9 km) via NH8

Book Here: Neemrana Fort Palace

SPONSORED

8. Westin Sohna Resort

From Horse Riding, Cycling, Aqua Zorbing, Fishing and Star Gazing, the Westin Sohna offers every possible option to make your weekend getaway an unforgettable trip. There's a spa and a poolside bar in the resort for all your friends and family to relax and rejuvenate instantly.

Distance from Delhi: 1 h 49 min (56.7 km) via Ballabhgarh-Sohna Rd/Sohna Rd

Book Here: Westin Sohna

9. Heritage Village Resort

If you want to experience royalty after excruciating work routine and without travelling all the way to Rajasthan, this is the perfect spot. Located just off the Delhi-Jaipur highway, Heritage Village Resort is a luxurious retreat and a good option among other resorts near Delhi for a weekend getaway.

Distance from Delhi: 1 h 40 min (52.3 km) via NH8

Book Here: Heritage Village Resort

10. Choki Dhani Resort

Choki Dhani Resort is a five star accommodation synonymous to luxury. It not only proves itself as one of the best luxury hotels in Jaipur but also gives an insight into the rich traditions of the common folks of this land of Maharajas. Choki Dhani can be ticket to an ultimate cultural tour of Rajasthan.

Distance from Delhi: 1 h 40 min (73.2 km) via NH 1

Book Here: Choki Dhani

Our lives are a large collection of single days one right after the other. The sun rises, the sun sets, and in the end, the lives we chose to live will be determined by how we choose to spend each day. Live well, travel more and share your stories on Tripoto.

Laxmi Niwas Palace

Do you have any recommendation for resorts near Delhi for a weekend getaway? Then share with us on Tripoto!
